ValidationRule.description: Req#2355-Make competitor mandatory for Opptys over a specified euro value. CustomLabel 'OpportunityThreshouldValue' is used to maintain Oppty ThreshouldValue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), Unweighted_Amount_EUR__c>=VALUE($Label.OpportunityThreshouldValue), NoOfCompetitor__c<1, ISCHANGED( Contract_Signing_Entity__c ) , ISPICKVAL(Contract_Signing_Entity__c,'fNOK'), OR($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Direct_Record_Type', $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Indirect_Record_Type'), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Request you to create at least one competitor for this Opportunity.
